WARNING: Guys, I have checked the timestamp on this crack.exe file, which BTW has been available on Limewire for a while and it says 2/23/2001 12:14:12 PM (checked using PE Explorer). Sounds suspicious to say at least. My advice: try at your own risk, but if I were you stay away from it!
popart it may give u a warning sign due its a crack n is not made with windows type of file base. i personaly tried it n it works u can also install the update. over all Great Crack!!
the "crack.exe" file waz also created Wednesday, August 10, 2005, 1:27:22 PM as u can see if u right click,properties

That's not the timestamp Sherwin0b0, that's the date and time it was LAST changed. This is what PE Explorer says about the Timestamp: Time Date Stamp = 32-bit-value, giving the time and date the file was CREATED. You can distinguish several versions of the same file by this value, even if the "official" version number was not altered.
